testproblem.name: p2p1-cg inverse Helmholtz filter convergence test

problem_definition.command_line: fluidity -v2 -l MMS_A_box.flml && fluidity MMS_B_box.flml && fluidity MMS_C_box.flml && fluidity MMS_D_box.flml

variables.variable:
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat from math import log output=open('output.log','w')
a_error = stat("MMS_A_box.stat")["NS"]["Difference"]["l2norm"][-1] b_error = stat("MMS_B_box.stat")["NS"]["Difference"]["l2norm"][-1]
a_error_inf = stat("MMS_A_box.stat")["NS"]["Difference"]["max"][-1] b_error_inf = stat("MMS_B_box.stat")["NS"]["Difference"]["max"][-1]
ab_ratio = a_error / b_error ab_ratio_inf = a_error_inf / b_error_inf
output.write('ab_convergence '+str(log(ab_ratio, 2))+' '+str(log(ab_ratio_inf, 2))+'\n') output.close()
ab_convergence = [log(ab_ratio, 2), log(ab_ratio_inf, 2)]
